donate.paypal-note: I do not offer paypal as a listed option due to fees (Stripe doesn't charge fees to Students). However, if you wish you can send me money over PayPal via funds@ezekielelin.com
donate.patreon-text: If you Pledge to donate a certain amount each month, I can rely on that to upgrade the servers.
donate.support-subheader: I don't want to put ads on this website, please donate to support the costs of maintaining this website.
donate.donate-text: Make a donation of the value you choose (Stripe).
donate.overcast-text: Want to buy me a rank on the Overcast Network? Click the picture above, and enter ezekielelin as my username.
donate.exit-text: You won't see this again so long as you keep your cookies intact. Unfortunately I have no way of detecting you if you reset your cookies.

help.raw-text-tab: Choose your text choice. Raw is normal text. Scoreboard pulls a value from the scoreboard. Selector pulls the name of an entity.
help.report-an-issue: Click here to report an issue. If you experience any sort of bug, you should report it here.
help.dropdown-list: Tweet, view the changelog, view the minecraft forums thread, or get resources for translation.
help.addsnippet: Add text to your tellraw command.
help.delete-all-saves: Clear your saves, but leave your current command in the main editor intact.
help.create-new-save: Make a new save. This will overwrite an existing save by the same name, if you so choose.
help.delete-all-snippets: Clear your command completely, but leave your saves intact.
help.show-saves: Show your saves editor, allows saving, loading, and deletion of saves.

saves.persistencenotice: Comandos salvos podem ser reiniciados em qualquer hora, e dependem dos cookies de seu navegador.

deleteall.body: Isso deleta apenas seus comandos salvos, não afeta o atual.
deleteall.heading: Tem certeza?

saves.nosaves: Você não tem nenhum comando salvo, ainda.

settings.previewcolor: Cor do plano de fundo da previsão:

deleteall.body: Isso irá deletar todo o comando atual.
deleteall.heading: Tem certeza?

importtext.default: Insira o comando. Em caso de erros, use o botão "Deletar tudo". Apenas /tellraw funciona.
importtext.exported: Insira aqui. Comandos não criados diretamente deste site podem não funcionar.

player.description: Usado para selecionar o comando e o jogador no qual será usado

commandblock: Este comando é grande demais e pode ser executado apenas em blocos de comando ou console.

alert.changed: Esta página foi modificada recentemente. No caso de problemas, recarregue-a.

attribution: Enquanto nada é preciso para usar isso, agradecemos divulgações do site ou do tópico em Minecraft Forum.
